web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: TailAdmin DropdownMenu (lines 577-665) is a custom implementation lacking keyboard accessibility. Only has click-outside to close. The Radix UI version at web/src/components/ui/dropdown-menu.jsx already has full keyboard support.

web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: MachineCard uses TailAdmin DropdownMenu for the action menu (lines 621-665). This is the primary use case that needs keyboard accessibility.
